posts.post_content:
Offered here is a nice lot of 9 B18 blankets highlighted by 2 hall of fame players Maranville and Stengel for 135.00, which is 15.00 per blanket. Also included in order top left to right is Burns, Shanks, Connolly, Walsh, Wagner, Tesreau, and Gainor. Most are mid grade or nicer with Maranville being a nicer example. Please check scans for condition
SOLD
